name: cable car
example_en: We took the cable car to the top of the mountain to enjoy the breathtaking view.
example_cn: 我们乘坐缆车到山顶，欣赏那令人叹为观止的景色。
word_family: cable (n. 缆绳), car (n. 车), cable railway (n. 缆车铁路)
memory_tips: 词源：'cable' 来自拉丁语 'capulum'，意为绳索或链。'car' 来自拉丁语 'carrus'，意为车。联想记忆：想象一条巨大的缆绳（cable）拉着一个小车（car）在山间穿行。图像记忆：想象一幅画面，缆车在蓝天白云下缓缓上升，背景是翠绿的山脉。

image_prompt.main_image: A colorful cable car ascending a steep mountain slope, with lush green trees and a clear blue sky in the background. The cable car is suspended by a thick steel cable, and passengers can be seen looking out of the windows.
image_prompt.example_image: A group of tourists inside a cable car, smiling and pointing at the stunning mountain view outside. The interior of the cable car is cozy, with large windows allowing for panoramic views.

collocations: cable car ride (缆车之旅); cable car system (缆车系统); mountain cable car (山地缆车)
